channel.title: Kind of challenging to add, if it is possible?
channel.description: Is there a way I can add a ::buyitem itemid amount command, that buys the item for the market price X .5 added on to it? I dont know if it will be possible, but if you can, please post!

i wonder if u could make it like…

ok you type the command ::buyitem rune scimitar

then it says like, if player has item 995, 20000
add item ####<—rune scim

Good luck and finding it out yourself ;P.
